NewEntity.Name: Project

Columns.Name: ProjectId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectName
Columns.Description: The name of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Project Type.

Columns.Name: ProjectPlannedStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The planned start timestamp of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectPlannedEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The planned end timestamp of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectEarliestStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The earliest start timestamp of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectEarliestEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The earliest end timestamp of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectLatestStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The latest start timestamp of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectLatestEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The latest end timestamp of a Project.

Columns.Name: ProjectClosingTimestamp
Columns.Description: The closing timestamp of the project.

Columns.Name: ProjectRiskAssessmentStatement
Columns.Description: A statement in which planners identify potential risks and describe them, usually in terms of their symptoms, causes, probability of occurrence and potential impact.

Columns.Name: ProjectWorkStatement
Columns.Description: A description of the scope of a project centered on the major deliverables and constraints.

Columns.Name: ProjectCharterStatement
Columns.Description: A document that describes the project at a high level of detail and is used to authorize the project management to begin work.

Columns.Name: BusinessCaseStatement
Columns.Description: The information that describes the justification for the project. The project is justified if the expected benefits outweigh estimated costs and risks. The business case is often complex and may require financial analysis, technical analysis, organization impact analysis and a feasibility study.

Columns.Name: LocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.

Columns.Name: ProjectGlAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The GL Account Number assigned to a Project.

Columns.Name: ResponsibilityCenterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Responsibility Center.

Columns.Name: ProjectNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the project.

Properties.Description: A project is a temporary activity with a starting date, specific goals and conditions, defined responsibilities, a budget, a planning, a fixed end date and multiple parties involved.

NewEntity.Description: A project is a temporary activity with a starting date, specific goals and conditions, defined responsibilities, a budget, a planning, a fixed end date and multiple parties involved.

Properties.Description: Any work performed in conjunction with a project. This is frequently analogous to a task but may be used to group or consolidate tasks.

NewEntity.Description: Any work performed in conjunction with a project. This is frequently analogous to a task but may be used to group or consolidate tasks.

NewEntity.Name: ProjectBudget

Columns.Name: ProjectBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Project Budget.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated budget is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated budget is prepared.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: OrganizationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an organization.
